txt.en: 'I have just received word that our encampment in Annúminas is under heavy and near constant assault. Echad Garthadir is our one foothold in the city itself, and we cannot afford to lose it.\n\n'I believe that we can handle what is left to do here within the tombs. Please, journey to Echad Garthadir and join the fight there!'
'Welcome to the centre of the conflict, [placeholder]. If tomb-robbers or Gauredain gave you trouble in the past, I would advise you leave now. The battles here are for true warriors.'
'I do not know the horrors you will find once you get to Echad Garthadir, so steel yourself for anything!'
Echad Garthadir, the Rangers' encampment within Annúminas, is under constant assault.
Talk to Adadhrond at Echad Garthadir
Echad Garthadir lies some distance from the Way of Kings, within Annúminas.\n\nThe Rangers have sent you to lend aid to Echad Garthadir.
